title:
A Functional Central Limit Theorem for the General Brownian Motion on
  the Half-Line
authors: Dirk Erhard, Tertuliano Franco, Milton Jara and Eduardo Pimenta
abstract:
In this work, we establish a Trotter-Kato type theorem. More precisely, we
characterize the convergence in distribution of Feller processes by examining
the convergence of their generators. The main novelty lies in providing
quantitative estimates in the vague topology at any fixed time. As important
applications, we deduce functional central limit theorems for random walks on
the positive integers with boundary conditions, which converge to Brownian
motions on the positive half-line with boundary conditions at zero.
